titulo: Bitcoin arbitrage yields shrink as institutions pull back, a sharp compression in bitcoin futures spreads eroding the appeal of the cash-and-carry trade that once drew billions from institutions. Falling yields and shifting market structure now point to a more mature crypto derivatives market.
noticia: Bitcoin price: 23.450 dolares Ethereum price: 1.650 dolares XRP price: 0.350 dolares BNB price: 220 dolares Fonte: CoinMarketCap
